types.name: feat: A new feature

types.name: fix: A bug fix
types.description: Patches a bug in your codebase

types.name: style: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code
types.description: Code style changes (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)

types.name: refactor: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
perf: A code change that improves performance
test: Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests
build: Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies
ci: Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts
chore: Other changes that don't modify src or test files
